messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Could you help me compile a list of all base models from Samsung's Galaxy S Series and Galaxy Note Series smartphones released in the U.S. market between January 2015 and May 2025 (including January 2015 and May 2025 )? Please include the following details for each model.

Notes:
Market Restriction: Only include models officially released in the U.S. market (exclude region-exclusive models limited to specific countries/regions).
Base Model Definition: Refers to models without suffixes (common suffixes: Ultra, Plus, FE, 5G, Z, Flip, Fold, "Edition", etc.). For a model lineup, select the version with the lowest launch price (e.g., "Galaxy S23" with 8GB+128GB). Note: "5G" and "4G" are not considered suffixes.
4G/5G Preference: If a base model has both 4G and 5G versions, only include the 5G version.
Release Date: The time when it was first released in the U.S..
Formatting Rules:
Release Date: yyyy-mm-dd
Pre-installed OS: Android/iOS number (e.g., Android 5)
Resolution: "numberxnumber" (e.g., 2340x1080)
CPU Manufacturing Process: "number+unit" (e.g., 4nm)
CPU Core Count: "x+core" (e.g., 8-core)
Highest Camera Resolution: "number+unit" (e.g., 200MP)
CPU Model: Omit the processor brand (e.g., only "Snapdragon 8 Gen 2" instead of "Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2")
storage: refer to the lowest storage of the base model.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the specified column order:
Model Name, Release Date, Pre-installed OS, Processor Brand, CPU Model, CPU Manufacturing Process, CPU Core Count, Screen Size, Resolution, Battery Capacity, RAM Size, Storage Size, Highest Camera Resolution, Launch Price (USD)

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To compile the list of base models from Samsung's Galaxy S Series and Galaxy Note Series smartphones released in the U.S. market between January 2015 and May 2025, I will need to collect the necessary data step-by-step. 

<search>Samsung Galaxy S Series and Galaxy Note Series smartphones released in the U.S. market between January 2015 and May 2025</search>

Search query: Samsung Galaxy S Series and Galaxy Note Series smartphones released in the U.S. market between January 2015 and May 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samsung_Galaxy_S_series):
Samsung Galaxy S series - Wikipedia The Samsung Galaxy S series is a flagship line of Android-based smartphones developed, produced and marketed by Samsung Electronics. It serves as Samsung's ...

History & Evolution of Samsung Galaxy Smartphones | T-Mobile The History of Samsung Galaxy Smartphones: 15 Years of Innovation & Evolution ; The First Samsung Galaxy S (2010). Release Date: June 2010.

[Doc 3](https://www.phonearena.com/news/Samsung-Galaxy-S-series-history-evolution_id78382):
Samsung Galaxy S series evolution - PhoneArena Announced in early 2025, the Galaxy S25 series is the first range of Samsung phones to come with a 3nm chip, the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy.
<search>Officially released in the U.S. market, exclude region-exclusive models limited to specific countries/regions</search>

Search query: Officially released in the U.S. market, exclude region-exclusive models limited to specific countries/regions
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.cfr.org/blog/what-know-about-new-us-ai-diffusion-policy-and-export-controls):
What to Know About the New U.S. AI Diffusion Policy and ... The Biden administration released new export controls on Monday, January 13, placing restrictions on advanced AI chips, cloud access, and model weights.

[Doc 2](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/01/15/2025-00636/framework-for-artificial-intelligence-diffusion):
Framework for Artificial Intelligence Diffusion At a high level, this strategy aims to ensure that the model weights of the most advanced U.S. AI models are stored outside the United States ...

[Doc 3](https://subscriber.politicopro.com/article/2025/12/rubio-bars-five-figures-behind-foreign-tech-rules-from-entering-us-00705491):
Rubio bars five figures behind foreign tech rules from ... Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced Tuesday that the U.S. will deny entry to five foreign technology and disinformation leaders, ...

Result: [Doc 1](https://fcrr.org/sites/g/files/upcbnu2836/files/media/projects/essentials-for-reading-success/instructional-routines/Phonics-3-Affixes.pdf):
[PDF] Phonics Instructional Routine: Identify Base Words and Affixes to ... A base word is a word that can have a prefix or a suffix added to it. When a prefix or suffix is added to a base word, the word's meaning changes and a new word ...

Angular 20 - removing suffixes from components / services - Reddit The component suffix there is redundant and unnecessary. So that means at the very least, the suffix would drop from the component class name.

[Doc 3](https://mbsteven.edublogs.org/tag/base-elements/):
base elements | Mrs. Steven's Classroom Blog Affixes are either derivational (alter the meaning of the word by building on the base) or inflectional (have a grammatical function). All ...

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.kbb.com/car-news/return-of-the-base-trim-automakers-look-to-lower-prices/):
Return of the Base Trim: Automakers Look to Lower Prices Looking to lower prices, several automakers plan to reintroduce inexpensive base trim levels of many models.

[Doc 2](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tesla-launches-model-3-y-201702572.html):
Tesla launches Model 3 and Y priced below ... The new Model 3 Standard Rear-Wheel Drive starts at $36,990 before shipping and $38,630 with shipping and order fee, Tesla said on its website.

[Doc 3](https://www.reddit.com/r/TeslaLounge/comments/1ikwp6j/will_the_model_y_launch_edition_price_drop_when/):
Will the Model Y Launch Edition price drop when regular ... I doubt that. Adding up the retail price of all the launch edition features on top of the old base model comes out more expensive.
